help.title: Help & Support
help.faq1_q: How do I make a booking?
help.faq1_a: Search for hotels by location and dates, select your preferred room, fill in guest details, and complete the payment. You'll receive a confirmation email and can view your booking in the 'Bookings' section.
help.faq2_q: How can I cancel my booking?
help.faq2_a: Go to 'My Bookings', select the booking you want to cancel, and tap 'Cancel Booking'. Cancellation policies vary by hotel - please check the hotel's terms before booking.
help.faq3_a: We accept bKash mobile payments and wallet balance. You can add money to your wallet for faster checkout on future bookings.
help.faq4_q: How do I earn loyalty points?
help.faq4_a: Earn points on every booking! You get 1 point per à§³10 spent, plus bonus points for QR code check-ins. Points can be redeemed for discounts on future bookings.
help.faq5_a: The wallet lets you store money for quick payments. Add funds via bKash and use your balance for booking fees and full payments. It's faster and more convenient!
help.faq6_q: How do I contact a hotel directly?
help.faq6_a: On each hotel's page, you'll find contact information including phone number and address. You can also reach out through our support for any issues.
